name: stoner-system
description: 多分店匯款管理系統 - Vue 3 前端與 Node.js 後端

scripts.dev:alt: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter stoner-system-frontend build && pnpm --filter stoner-system-backend build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter stoner-system-frontend test && pnpm --filter stoner-system-backend test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter stoner-system-frontend lint && pnpm --filter stoner-system-backend lint
